website_summaries.verdict: The feature-packed V10 is LG's best smartphone yet -- just be prepared to pay a premium for its selfie- and photo-friendly extras.
pros: The sturdily designed LG V10 gives users more camera control with manual modes for both photos and video, a fingerprint sensor, two front-facing cameras for wider selfie shots, expandable memory and a removable battery
cons: The handset is pricey, its secondary display doesn't offer any essential necessities and its manual camera features require some time to learn

customer_reviews.title: This F600 version works pretty good with AT&T 4G LTE ( you can use ...
customer_reviews.text: I brought my current LG V10 F600 from Daese. So far I am very please with it, it came with an earphone, a translucent case and a screen protector. This F600 version works pretty good with AT&T 4G LTE ( you can use this link to check the compatable between your phone and carriers in US [...]) Daese has a great customer service. The shipment is fast and they have tried their best to meet the customer satisfaction. I said this based on my own experience and did not receive any thing from them in return.
customer_reviews.author: Phuong

customer_reviews.title: Happy for new phone
customer_reviews.text: Great phone very beautiful style i am very happy The only think i recommend for the seller is on amazon put the model lg-H961N dual sim im happy for dual sim but i never know that

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really it's a great phone, the camera is amazing and it works perfectly in Monterrey (Mexico) 👍

customer_reviews.text: When I tray to put the second simcard did not respond at all. You make sure that before you buy , but still i see that gorgeous phone.

customer_reviews.title: LG V10 V990
customer_reviews.text: It's a great phone in every thing and the additional thing in it that every type of SIM cards will work with it (CDMA & GSM) but his only flaw is the battrey, cause it drains too fast especially when you are using WiFi. I bought the 6500 mah Battrey for it and now every thing is ok. If you used another SIM card than verizon, the mobile hotspot will not work.
customer_reviews.author: Banwan

customer_reviews.title: Splash poof
customer_reviews.text: Spashed a bit of water on it game over. Worked great for a year but then the batt goes down hill. Hard on batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Philski

customer_reviews.title: Best all around phone
customer_reviews.text: The best all around phone on the market. Best camera with manual video capturing. Practical secondary screen. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: My V10 Experience
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Lg V10 a few months back for Christmas and I've fallen in love. I got the unlocked version and now serviced through Straight Talk for $45 a month. My phone works great and I've traveled from Illinois to Florida and never lost service once, even through the mountains. The camera is so nice and the wide view on the front is really convenient. Most definitely a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Appears dark spots in the screen in less than 3 months using it.
customer_reviews.text: I had this phone for less than 3 months, and the screen started to have dark spots, I sent my device twice to the service, I even explained in a white paper the issue and they returned to me the same phone with a note "software error" when it is clearly a hardware issue, never replaced the phone not fixed, this is a bad product and the service behind it is as bad as the service. service RA # A0164G41198 and RA # A0165G57661 that proof that I sent to the service twice !
customer_reviews.author: David G Effio F

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely best phone Ive ever owned. Had Samsung Note 4, LG G4 HTC one...this kicks them all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I thought my last phone was crap until I got this. Most difficult pos phone I've ever owned
customer_reviews.author: Jovanae Hauschild

customer_reviews.title: Read This Review!
customer_reviews.text: You will love the features, Camera, Screen, Software, 2nd screen (which are great for notifications), Fingerprint sensor. Overall it's an excellent phone and does not hiccup. Feels great in the hand, and you don't need a case. I highly recommend it. You will not have buyers remorse. Cons * Battery is very average. Which is why you should carry a 2nd battery. * Speaker isn't as good as G3 and G4. Not bad. Just not as good. * Fingerprint sensor is hit and miss. I'd say 90/10%. But it's fast. * I wish Qslide had the Youtoube app. * Despite the claims, screen is NOT shatter proof.
customer_reviews.author: ss

customer_reviews.title: I so far have no complaints and would recommend it to a friend
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this phone when I was vacationing in Tampa. I so far have no complaints and would recommend it to a friend. Someone wrote that you cannot access the fingerprint mode to unlock. You have to get the right case. I bought mine from AT&T and it works flawlessly. In all, a sexy and great phone.
customer_reviews.author: walter

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I Got it back in December from the story it's amazing always get tempored glass for your phone
customer_reviews.author: Lindsy s.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome get one, LG is a great company
customer_reviews.text: Amazing phone and very pretty. Only negative is my glass scratched all ready. Wierd....Also I never use the second screen
customer_reviews.author: LoafTheTabby

product_meta.title: LG V10 Unlocked Smartphone - International Version (White)
feature_bullets: Card slot microSD, up to 128 GB Internal	64 GB, 4 GB RAM

Primary 16 MP, 5312 x 2988 pixels, laser autofocus, optical image stabilization, LED flash Features	1/2.6'' sensor size, simultaneous video and image recording, geo-tagging, face detection, HDR Video	2160p@30fps, 1080p@60fps, optical stabilization, HDR, stereo sound rec. Secondary	5 MP Duo
OS Android OS, v5.1.1 (Lollipop) Chipset	Qualcomm MSM8992 Snapdragon 808 CPU	Quad-core 1.44 GHz Cortex-A53 & dual-core 1.82 GHz Cortex-A57 GPU	Adreno 418
IPS LCD capacitive touchscreen, 16M colors Size 5.7 inches (~70.8% screen-to-body ratio) Resolution	1440 x 2560 pixels (~515 ppi pixel density) Multitouch	Yes Protection	Corning Gorilla Glass 4
